summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Park Commissioners to acquire by private purchase for park and playground purposes, certain portions of the southwest one fourth (SW 1/4) of the southeast one fourth (SE 1/4) of Section Thirteen (13), Township Twenty Four (24), North, Range Three (3) East W. M. for a sum not to exceed Fifteen Thousand Dollars, ($15,000.00) payable from the City Park Fund.
